attributes.text:
The JSONP data store is a specialization of {@link qx.data.store.Json}. It differs in the type of transport used ({@link qx.io.request.Jsonp}). In order to fulfill requirements of the JSONP service, the method {@link #setCallbackParam} can be used.

Please note that the upgrade notices described in {@link qx.data.store.Json} also apply to this class.
URL of the JSONP service.
The delegate containing one of the methods specified in {@link qx.data.store.IStoreDelegate}.
The name of the callback param. See {@link qx.bom.request.Jsonp#setCallbackParam} for more details.

Returns the (computed) value of the property callbackName.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #callbackName}.
(Computed) value of callbackName.

Returns the (computed) value of the property callbackParam.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #callbackParam}.
(Computed) value of callbackParam.
Initial value for property callbackName.

Calls the apply method and dispatches the change event of the property callbackName with the default value defined by the class developer. This function can only be called from the constructor of a class.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #callbackName}.
the default value
Initial value for property callbackParam.

Calls the apply method and dispatches the change event of the property callbackParam with the default value defined by the class developer. This function can only be called from the constructor of a class.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #callbackParam}.
the default value

Resets the user value of the property callbackName.

The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depeneding on the property configuration and value availability.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #callbackName}.

Resets the user value of the property callbackParam.

The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depeneding on the property configuration and value availability.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #callbackParam}.
New value for property callbackName.

Sets the user value of the property callbackName.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #callbackName}.
The unmodified incoming value.
New value for property callbackParam.

Sets the user value of the property callbackParam.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #callbackParam}.
The unmodified incoming value.

The name of the callback function. See {@link qx.bom.request.Jsonp#setCallbackName} for more details.

Note: Ignored when legacy transport is used.
The name of the callback parameter of the service. See {@link qx.bom.request.Jsonp#setCallbackParam} for more details.
